body.p: I shall be glad if you can come this far tomorrow forenoon that the case of assault complained of by Wi Tipuna may be adjusted. I do not think the case will delay you very long and I regret exceedingly having occasion to request your attendance at a time when you have lost your comfortable house; at which I have received so many kind attentions, but I feel assured that you will feel sensible that nothing but a sense of duty would induce me at a time like this present to solicit your attendance.
